valideringsfeil.egenNæringNavn.påkrevd: You must provide the name of your business.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringNavn.forLang: The name of your business can contain a maximum of 100 characters.
egenNæring.næringstype.dagmamma: Childminder or family daycare in your own home
egenNæring.næringstype: What type of business do you have?
egenNæring.navnPåNæring: What is the name of your business?
egenNæring.næring.fom: When did you start the business?
egenNæring.næring.tom: When did you close the business?
egenNæring.næring.tom.description: If you closed your business more than 4 weeks before you are set to start receiving pregnancy benefits, the business will not affect your eligibility for pregnancy benefits.
egenNæring.erNæringenRegistrertINorge: Is the business registered in Norway?
egenNæring.registrertILand: In which country is your business registered?
egenNæring.næringsinntekt: What has been your business income before tax in the last 12 months?
egenNæring.næringsinntekt.description: If the business has existed for less than a year, you can use this period and convert it to an annual income.
egenNæring.næringsinntekt.info: Business income is the income you have from your business, minus expenses and depreciation.
egenNæring.veileder: Nav retrieves information about your business and income from public registers. Nav will contact you if we need additional information.
egenNæring.blittYrkesaktivSiste3År: Have you started working within the last three tax-assessed years?
egenNæring.yrkesaktivDato: When did you become professionally active?
egenNæring.egenNæringHattVarigEndringDeS: Have you had a permanent change in your business or work situation in the last 4 years?
What is meant by a permanent change?

By permanent change, we mean something that has changed in your work situation or business. This can be a reorganization of how you work, an expansion of your operations, or a concrete change in your market. A change in income alone (increased or decreased income) is not enough to count as a permanent change.
egenNæring.egenNæringVarigEndringDato: What was the date of the change?
egenNæring.egenNæringVarigEndringInntekt: What was your business income after the change?
Provide the annual income in whole NOK.
egenNæring.varigEndringBeskrivelse.label: What has changed in your business or work situation?
valideringsfeil.yrkesaktiv.gyldigDato: The date you became professionally active must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy.
valideringsfeil.yrkesaktiv.erIFremtiden: The date you became professionally active must be before or equal to today's date.
valideringsfeil.yrkesaktiv.påkrevd: You must provide the date you became professionally active.
The date is more than 5 months ago. If you closed the business more than 5 months ago, you do not need to report the business to Nav.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringOrgnr.påkrevd: You must provide the organization number.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringLand.påkrevd: You must specify the country in which the business is registered.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringLand.ikkeNorge: You answered that the business is not registered in Norway and therefore cannot specify Norway as the country where the business is registered.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringType.påkrevd: You must specify the type of business you have.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringRegistrertINor: You must specify if the business is registered in Norway.
valideringsfeil.næringsinntekt.ugyldigFo: Business income must be an integer.
valideringsfeil.næringsinntekt.forLang: Business income can contain a maximum of 9 digits.
valideringsfeil.næringsinntekt.mindreEnn: Business income must be a number that is greater than or equal to 0.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringInntekt.mind: Your business income after the change must be a number that is greater than or equal to 0.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringInntekt.forL: Your business income after the change can contain a maximum of 9 digits.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringPågående.påkre: You must specify if your business is ongoing.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringBlittYrkesakti: You must specify if you have started working within the last 3 tax-assessed years.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringOrgnr.ugyldigF: The organization number is not a valid Norwegian organization number.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringOrgnr.innehold: The organization number cannot contain spaces.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringInntekt.påkrev: You must provide business income for the last 12 months.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringHattVarigEndri: You must answer if you have had a permanent change in your business or work situation in the last 4 years.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringDato.påkrevd: You must provide the date of the change in your business or work situation.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringDato.gyldigD: The date of the change in your business or work situation must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringDato.mindreE: The date of the change in your business must be less than 4 years ago.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringDato.erIFrem: The date of the change in your business or work situation cannot be in the future.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringDato.førFraD: The date of the change in your business or work situation cannot be before the date you started the business.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringDato.etterTi: The date of the change in your business or work situation cannot be after the end date of the business.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringInntekt.påkr: You must provide your income after the change.
valideringsfeil.varigEndringInntekt.ugyl: Your income after the change must be a number in whole NOK.
valideringsfeil.egenNæringVarigEndringBe: You must provide a brief description of what has changed in your business or work situation.
The description of what has changed in your business or work situation can contain a maximum of 1000 characters.
The description of what has changed in your business or work situation must be at least 10 characters long.
valideringsfeil.fraOgMedDato.påkrevd: You must provide a start date.
valideringsfeil.fraOgMedDato.gyldigDato: The start date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy.
valideringsfeil.fraOgMedDato.erIFremtide: The start date must be before or equal to today's date.
valideringsfeil.fraOgMedDato.førTilDato: The start date must be the same as or before the end date.
valideringsfeil.tilOgMedDato.gyldigDato: The end date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy.
valideringsfeil.tilOgMedDato.påkrevd: You must provide an end date.
valideringsfeil.tilOgMedDato.erIFremtide: The end date cannot be more than nine months ahead.
valideringsfeil.tilOgMedDato.etterFraDat: The end date must be the same as or after the start date.
valideringsfeil.fritekst.kanIkkeInnehold: {ugyldigeTegn} are invalid characters in the field "{feltNavn}".
valideringsfeil.navnPåNæringen.forLang: "{feltNavn}" can consist of a maximum of 100 characters.
